decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation areas) Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [01, 02 and 03-A. Received: 16/07/2024
10. Received: 17/07/2024
Design and Access Statement and Heritage Statement. Received: 29/07/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good for the retained fabric, shall match the original work in type, colour, texture, profile and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution, including facebond and pointing. 
Reason: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic features of the listed building (and/or the character of the Conservation Area).
description: The installation of a new damp proof course and internal alterations including the removal of the internal partition wall in rear bedroom
